start.text: You stand at the embassy atrium. A faint alarm echoes.

investigate.text: You approach the control corridor; footsteps ahead.

hide.text: You duck behind a crate. Shadows move past.

call_help.text: You broadcast a distress signal on all channels.

confront.text: You confront the intrudersâ€”they seem confused.

sneak.text: You slip through service ducts toward the hangar.

wait.text: You wait quietly, but alarms intensify.

ally_arrives.text: An ally ship docks; backup secures the area.

no_response.text: Silence. You are on your own.
